# SMRY (smry.ai)

> Paste any paywalled article link and get the full text plus an AI summary. Free to use, no account, no browser extension.

SMRY is an AI-powered paywall bypass and article reader trusted by 300,000+ readers monthly. It fetches articles from 3 sources simultaneously (direct access, premium proxy, Wayback Machine) and works with 1,000+ publications including NYT, WSJ, Bloomberg, The Atlantic, Washington Post, and Medium.

## Pages

- [Homepage](https://smry.ai): Main page with article URL input
- [Pricing](https://smry.ai/pricing): Free and Pro plan details
- [Paywall Bypass Guide](https://smry.ai/guide): How paywall bypass works, soft vs hard paywalls
- [Understanding Hard Paywalls](https://smry.ai/hard-paywalls): Why some paywalls cannot be bypassed
- [Changelog](https://smry.ai/changelog): Recent features and improvements

## Full Documentation

- [llms-full.txt](https://smry.ai/llms-full.txt): Comprehensive documentation including features, pricing, FAQ, and supported publications

## Quick Start

Prepend `smry.ai/` to any article URL:

    smry.ai/nytimes.com/2025/01/some-article

Or paste a URL at https://smry.ai

## Pricing

- Free: 20 articles/day, limited AI summaries
- Pro (~$3-5/month): Unlimited articles, unlimited AI summaries, ad-free, full history

## Open Source

Source code: https://github.com/mrmps/SMRY
